content.raw:
‌

> `./jenkins-scripts/cygwin/dsl/roscywgin_compilation.dsl`: I'm not sure if this code is actually used. I don't see it in the [\_dsl\_generate\_all\_dsls job](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_generate_all_dsls/)

Please remove all the references to roscywgin. The project is too old now. 

> `manual-jenkins-script-launcher/*` I don't know what this subfolder is used for either, though it would be easy enough to change the URL here as well when the time is right

The directory contains some scripts to run the testing scripts in your local system. Probably only the docker subdirectory should survive.
content.html:
‌

./jenkins-scripts/cygwin/dsl/roscywgin_compilation.dsl: I'm not sure if this code is actually used. I don't see it in the _dsl_generate_all_dsls job

Please remove all the references to roscywgin. The project is too old now.

manual-jenkins-script-launcher/* I don't know what this subfolder is used for either, though it would be easy enough to change the URL here as well when the time is right

The directory contains some scripts to run the testing scripts in your local system. Probably only the docker subdirectory should survive.
